SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &ACTION_NAME# = "RunCommandAction"
: SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = 'java -jar "&UC4RB_JAR_PATH#"' : SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#, " -action &ACTION_NAME#")
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_JBOSS_V7.PUB.INCLUDE.SSH_PREPARE_CMD
! Invoking java binar &UC4RB_JAVA_CMD#
